turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Good morning.

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: Good morning, I think children are so important and charities that involve them are needed and we should participate our money or our time.

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: I agree. I would like to tell you about the organization Save the Children. They promote children's rights and help support children in developing countries.

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: Oh that's wonderful, what a great organization. Where can I read more about this organization and possible give a donate?

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: You could look at their website URL to get more information. You can make a donation directly from your payment from this task.

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: Ok, I will consider doing that.  What a great idea!  I would like to read a little about the charity before donating. How would I donate directly from this task?

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: The research team will collect the donations and send it to save the Children.

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: I would like to donate 10 cents from this task to Save the Children please.

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Ok, so that 10 cents will come out of your payment and you will keep the rest of the task payment

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: Yes, thank you.  I am poor and I can relate to the children who are also poor.  I really need the money that i'm earning for this task, so I feel like giving 10 cents to this charity is fair.  Do you agree?

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: I feel that this is very generous of you. Thank you for agreeing to make a donation.

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: Your welcome, it is a good feeling to help others in need. I appreciate you telling me about this organization and directing me to their website.

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: I am glad to share this iinformation. I feel that it is an important organization.

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: Yes it is.  I always wanted children of my own and could never conceive a child. So I have much empathy for these children and their needs.  I will tell friends and family to visit the charities website also.

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: That is very kind of you to spread the word about this charity. Thank you for all that you are doing.

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: How many years has Save The Children been doing charity work?

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: This organization has been around for a long time. I am not sure they exact number of years

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: That's good. These days there are tons of people asking for donations for fake charities, it's sad.

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Yes it is, but this is a good organizations and I really appreciate your donation

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: I want to thank you again for bringing awareness to this important charity. In America food is plentiful and we sometimes have to stop and reflect, that other countries aren't as fortunate as we are!
